properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 12:35PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 knots and waves 4 to 7 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Mexico Bay
to the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From 11 AM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY
